alert.note: Alert for Cavalier; Pembina (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 6:13AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Cavalier and Pembina Counties through 700 AM CDT... At 612 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles north of Walhalla to near Olga to near Osnabrock. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Milton, Walhalla and Concrete around 620 AM CDT. Leroy and Mountain around 630 AM CDT. Gardar, Backoo and Akra around 635 AM CDT. Cavalier and Hensel around 640 AM CDT. Neche around 645 AM CDT. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 190 and 217. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
